name: reference_an_on_premise_ldap_mulesoft
title: Reference an on-premise LDAP Mulesoft
description: This template is an example of referring to an LDAP repository to perform a generic search within Okta Workflows. It can be modified and applied to any sort of repository such as a SQL database. This example leverages the Mulesoft Anypoint platform to host the API endpoint consumed by Okta Workflows.
